content: work next row of instep chart sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 2 work instep in pattern as established knit all sole sts work these 2 rounds 12 14 times i e 24 28 rounds total decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 46 instep sts and 31 35 sole sts foot continue without decreasing i e work continuously as described in round 2 if your feet are so long that you need more than the 72 charted row of instep use the red lines to locate where to start the next pattern repeat the repeat length for the patterns is different so the starting point is offset when foot is approx 1 75 2 inches shorter than desired length stop after having completed one of the following rounds 36-39 42 43 47-51 54 55 58-63 66 70-75 82-87 91 94-99 102 or 103 ©caoua coffee 2016 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved coffee cantata v 1 1 page 4/16 coffee cantata socks - by caoua coffee toe set-up toes where the pattern stitches flow smoothly into a ribbing pattern look very pretty but traditional bavarian/tyrolean socks mostly had plain stockinette toes choose whichever toe version you prefer toe setup for plain stockinette toes work 2 rounds like this 1 round k k2tog k2 k2tog k3 k2tog k3 k2tog k2 twice k2tog k2 k2tog k2tog knit across all sole sts 2 round smaller size k2 k2tog k5 k2tog k4 twice k6 knit across all sole sts larger size knit around now you have 31 35 instep sts and 31 35 sole sts start working the toe see next page toe setup for ribbed toes the next 2 rounds are a bit of a brain teaser but bear with me it ll work round 1 instep look at the stitches on your needles and locate all pairs of ktbl and all groups of 3 juxtaposed ktbls then work across the instep stitches as follows purl all purls ktbl all single ktbls those bordered by a purl on each side k2togtbl all pairs of ktbl and k3togtbl all groups of 3 adjacent ktbls sole knit across all sole stitches round 2 instep look at the stitches on your needles and locate all pairs of purls and all groups of 3 juxtaposed purls then work across the instep stitches as follows ktbl all ktbls purl all single purls those bordered by a ktbl on each side p2tog all pairs of purls and p3tog all groups of 3 adjacent purls sole k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 now count your instep sts you should have 29sts regardless after which of those rounds of foot you stopped earlier and all those stitches now form a ktbl p ribbing pattern for larger heel only shift the first and last sole stitch over onto the instep needle s continue for both sizes you now have 29 31 instep sts and 29
